#summary JAVA API reference guide.

= API Reference guide =

The API reference is generated with DOxygen from the CDMA source code. It is split in 3 parts:

For client application developers:
[http://cdma.googlecode.com/svn/java/branches/soleil/doc/clientAPI/html/index.html Client reference API]

For data format engines developers:
[http://cdma.googlecode.com/svn/java/branches/soleil/doc/engineAPI/html/index.html Engine reference API]

For plug-ins developpers:
[http://cdma.googlecode.com/svn/java/branches/soleil/doc/pluginAPI/html/index.html Plug-ins reference API]

The current documentation is related to the version 3.1.0 which is Soleil's development branch.
